patthana16.36:1.1: Parittaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe ekādasa …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.36:2.1: Parittaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cuddasa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate cuddasa.
